product_name: The North Face Komit Performance T-Shirt - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Komit Performance T-shirt for boys covers the bases for athletic performance. Lightweight, quick-drying and moisture-wicking fabric keeps them looking and feeling their best. Polyester jersey fabric with VaporWick(TM) technology moves moisture away from the skin and keep him dry. UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Flatlock stitching and off-the-shoulder seams reduce chafing and irritation. Closeout.
